FuncDef: The display virtual-cluster-access vp protect-group command displays information about the VP(Virtual Path) protection group in a virtual cluster access.
CLIs: display virtual-cluster-access vp protect-group [ source <source-address> ] [ destination <destination-address> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the VP protection group with a specified source address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Displays information about the VP protection group with a specified destination address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Examples: Source Node ID    Dest Node ID      Group ID      State           Active VP
ExtraInfo: After you configure a virtual cluster access, you can run the display virtual-cluster-access vp protect-group command to view information about the VP protection group in the virtual cluster access. The information includes the running status of the VP protection group, information about the VP carrying traffic, ingress information, egress information, and forwarding entries.
